title: 'Worth product for the investment'
body: I bought this product with doubt, but, it was working as per the specification. All four ports were USB 3.0 and got the expected DATA TRANSFER SPEED. Now, I connected my External Hard Disk to this device and it's working faster. No difference was observed when connected on direct mother board and through this device.

title: 'Great product!'
body: 'CONS: Contrary to the pictures shown
column5: the product DOES NOT have VIBOTON logo.  PROS: However
column6: PERFORMANCE of the product is VERY SATISFYING and the LENGTH of the cable is as it claims
column8: too.  SPEED: Tested with 1TB External HDD (Toshiba)
column9: using USB3.0 Port :- WRITE speed: directly from the USB3.0 port - 65-70 MB/SEC. Through this USB hub - 30-35 MB/Sec READ speed: Both without & with this hub - MORE THAN 1 GB/Sec EASILY.  VERDICT: RECOMMENDED!!'

title: 'Good for a Powered USB hub - Even USB2'
body: I wanted a powered USB hub with limited ports that's not too costly. My barcode scanner is a power-hog. This one works well with power adapter. Added advantage is you can buy simple 1A micro-USB mobile chargers for that purpose. Seems durable with a cool blue light on the top port. Longevity have to wait. Overall a good product.

title: 'Item is with wrong and misleading specs. (Description updated by seller after this review)'
body: 'Only 1 port (1st from the cable side is Usb 3.0. All other 6 ports are usb 2.0. From outside all ports look like USB 3.0 only. But when connected only 1 port was usb 3.0
column5: others were usb 2.0. I opened to see whether the ports are genuine with 9 pins
column6: I found only one port on pcb to be correct. Other 6 usb ports were having attached 4 pins only on the board. This product is way too costly for what it has to offer. Wrong description and misleading offer was a very bad experience.'
